## Overview
A Zhenxun Bot plugin that allows users to query airport information using ICAO codes. The plugin provides comprehensive airport data including runway information, facilities, and operational status.

## Features
- Query airport information using ICAO codes
- Display results in either text or image format
- Comprehensive airport data including:
  - Basic information (ICAO/IATA/FAA codes)
  - Location and elevation
  - Runway information
  - Services and facilities
  - Operation status
  - Passenger traffic data
  - Radio frequencies

## Installation

1. Place the plugin files in your Zhenxun Bot plugins directory:
```bash
cd zhenxun_bot/plugins/
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/qbot-plugin-airport.git
```

2. Install required dependencies:
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

3. Configure the template path in your Zhenxun Bot configuration:
```
zhenxun_bot\resources\template
```

## Usage

### Commands
- Query with image output:
```
@Bot airport ICAO
```

- Query with text output:
```
@Bot airport ICAO --raw
```

Where `ICAO` is the four-letter ICAO airport code.

### Examples
```
@Bot airport ZBAA        # Query Beijing Capital International Airport
@Bot airport KLAX --raw  # Query Los Angeles International Airport in text format
```

## Dependencies
- Python 3.9+
- nonebot2
- nonebot-adapter-onebot
- nonebot-plugin-htmlrender
- aiohttp
- [zhenxun_bot_frame](https://github.com/zhenxun-org/zhenxun_bot/)

## Configuration

Make sure you have the following directory structure for templates:
```
your_bot_directory/
└── templates/
    └── aviation/
        └── airport/
            └── main.html
```
